articles.author: Rachael Levy
articles.title: Health care workers are panicked as desperate hospitals ask infected staff to return - POLITICO
articles.description: While most health workers are vaccinated, many are still falling sick, exacerbating a staff shortage as more Americans seek hospital care.
articles.content: While most health workers are vaccinated, many are still falling sick, exacerbatinga staff shortage as more Americans seek hospital care. The reliance on employees who may still be infectious comes d… [+6914 chars]
